author: lightclient
content: it's not my place to say yay or nay for consolidations as a concept, but in terms on complexity it seems straight forward for the EL to accumulate consolidation requests and send them over to the CL via the engine api

author: ethdreamer
content: yeah I meant that you seemed to agree with my assessment of complexity

author: lightclient
content: yep just wanted to make sure my post was only taken under that context üëç

author: lightclient
content: On the EL, I'm trying to convert all EL->CL messages to a similar data type so it is even easier for us to integrate these types of things going forward

author: g11tech
content: i have a similar assessment (from ethereumjs prespective), that complexity is only incremental w.r.t. 7002

author: g11tech
content: so imo we SHOULD do EL triggered consolidations

author: tersec
